location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on paper.Dimensions: 1270 x 820mm, on sheet 1400 x 860mm.

mods.abstract: Blueprint sketch map produced by the Producing Department of the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO).Shows names of settlements, and location of oil pipelines, water pipelines, telephone lines, gas lines, company roads, and 'native' roads, indicated in a key in the lower left portion of the map.
